name: Taxonomy Terms Widget
author: Utkarsh Kukreti

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to list the terms of any taxonomy in the form of a widget.
Supports several options to select, order, and display the terms.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ‘taxonomy-terms-widget’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Drag the widget to the appropriate sidebar from Appearance -> Widgets, and configure the options.

short_description: This plugin allows you to list the terms of any taxonomy in the form of a widget. Supports several options to select, order, and display the terms.
